column4: anyone knows what might be the problem if i can access vsftpd from lan and not from wan, i tested it with my firewall temperaly disabled and had no result
sudo lsof -i :21  are you sure it listens on all interfaces, not localhost only?
sudo lsof -i :2121  are you sure it listens on all interfaces, not localhost only?
no output? means no service listening on that port at all or you're using (x)inetd or something like that
